action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body: @glen - can you please tackle this one? Cheers

Hi Guys,

Can we please add the attached assets into the LM catalogues for PH and UH as follows:

Create a new category titled ‘Social Media Content’

Under this category create a tile titled ‘Global Recycling Day’ and upload the two social posts and the A4 sign.

Please let me know if this does not make sense.

Thanks.

Nikki Ozeken
Customer Marketing and VAS Manager

Sonova Australia Pty Ltd
12 Inglewood Place, Norwest
NSW 2153 Australia
Phone: +61 2 8858 1841
Mobile: +61 427 017 997

Subject: Global recycling day assets
Importance: High

Hi Jadyn,

We’d like to design some assets to promote global recycling day https://www.globalrecyclingday.com/ <https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.globalrecyclingday.com%2F&data=04%7C01%7CNikki.Ozeken%40sonova.com%7Cd10e411666ba4b8d574e08da0008bcb1%7Cf1ed0701294e404ca13bf81f707f845b%7C0%7C0%7C637822335654870309%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=voTpyGnZdl48gd6k32g2giHx7oRvIWlKtYhxz8liq4k%3D&reserved=0> 18 March and Earth Day in April.

As part of these events, we’re creating a campaign to promote the safe recycling of hearing aid zinc air button batteries in clinics and arming them with information to supply to their customers on how batteries can be recycled safely.

Social post:

Please create Phonak and Unitron versions.

Creative can generic be same for both brands but add logo for each to differentiate.

Please create a social post with sizing that works for FB and IG.

‘Today is Global Recycling Day and a great time to recognise the importance of recycling for the environment. Did you know that a pair of hearing aids can use around 100 batteries a year? So it’s important that we dispose of batteries responsibly by dropping them off to a collection centre to have toxic metals removed and recycled. Click here to find your nearest collection centre.’


A4 sign

Please create Phonak and Unitron versions. These will be displayed by clinics. You can add images of a pile of HI zinc batteries like this.



Phonak version

Add logo.

Copy:

‘Did you know that a pair of hearing aids can use around 100 batteries a year? It’s important that we dispose of batteries responsibly by dropping them off to a collection centre to have toxic metals removed and recycled.
Find your nearest collection centre.’
Add a QR code that links to https://batteryrecycling.org.au/recycle-batteries/why/find-a-recycler/ <https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbatteryrecycling.org.au%2Frecycle-batteries%2Fwhy%2Ffind-a-recycler%2F&data=04%7C01%7CNikki.Ozeken%40sonova.com%7Cd10e411666ba4b8d574e08da0008bcb1%7Cf1ed0701294e404ca13bf81f707f845b%7C0%7C0%7C637822335654870309%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=4zyBMCKGyKBPKW4fReEscVa2BeQH9SRF8ovH3ewqWiI%3D&reserved=0>

Unitron version
Copy:

‘Did you know that a pair of hearing aids can use around 100 batteries a year? It’s important that we dispose of batteries responsibly by dropping them off to a collection centre to have toxic metals removed and recycled.
Drop off your batteries here or find your nearest collection centre.’

Add a QR code that links to https://batteryrecycling.org.au/recycle-batteries/why/find-a-recycler/ <https://eur01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fbatteryrecycling.org.au%2Frecycle-batteries%2Fwhy%2Ffind-a-recycler%2F&data=04%7C01%7CNikki.Ozeken%40sonova.com%7Cd10e411666ba4b8d574e08da0008bcb1%7Cf1ed0701294e404ca13bf81f707f845b%7C0%7C0%7C637822335654870309%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000&sdata=4zyBMCKGyKBPKW4fReEscVa2BeQH9SRF8ovH3ewqWiI%3D&reserved=0>
